pkgmetadata.longdescription: Accessing NOAA Climate Data Online // Fetch data from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Climate Data Online (NOAA CDO) https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo- web/webservices/v2 API including daily, monthly, and yearly climate summaries, radar data, climatological averages, precipitation data, annual summaries, storm events, and agricultural meteorology.
